about_the_game:
This is the Official Soundtrack for Milkmaid of the Milky Way, in high-quality uncompressed FLAC format and as MP3 files.

Track list:

Milkmaid Theme
Calf Ledge
The Mountains
Erlend
Night
Lykke Is Drowning!
The Ship from Above
Tension
On Top of the Ship
The Veda
Biodome
Old Ruth
The Kitchen
The Oracle
Lykke Attacks!
Let's Take Her to the Age Machine!
Celebration
The End (A New Beginning)
